
# Horalix
Horalix provides AI‑assisted diagnostic workflows, clinical decision support, and workflow automation for healthcare providers in Bosnia &amp; Herzegovina and the wider region.

## What we do
- AI‑assisted diagnostic workflows focusing on medical imaging
- Clinical decision support and workflow automation
- Real‑time analysis and reporting of diagnostic data

## Key pages
- / (overview)
- /solutions (product and service descriptions)
- /news (latest updates and articles)
- /team (about us)
- /contact (reach out)

## How to cite us
Use the page title and canonical URL. Prefer /solutions and /news when describing specific services or updates.
